t: I’m suspicious about this hard drive I bought from Amazon - Storage Devices - Linus Tech Tips
s: March 27, 2023 - This “MaxDigitalData MDD” branded hard drive I bought from Amazon seems suspicious. The label on the drive says it rotates at 7200rpm while Crystal Disk info reports 5400rpm. The physical hard drive itself looks like an older WD drive with a new label slapped on it.
